name: Rivers of Love
description: Sundarbans is a spectacular river delta that is located on the border of India and Bangladesh. The crisscrossing rivers and channels make the way towards the Indian ocean through the largest mangrove forest in the world, know also as "The Beautiful forest". Raw satellite data of the area was used to produce this abstract mandala that emphasizes the natural geometric patterns. Processed in GIS and raster graphics editor software. Input data from Sentinel-1 radar instrument courtesy of ESA and Copernicus.
